context: Expedia was a leading OTA in 2010 with merchant model selling pre-purchased hotel inventory. The company owned Hotels.com and Hotwire, competing with Priceline's agency model.

competitors.name: Priceline
competitors.notes: Booking.com parent company growing rapidly in Europe

competitors.name: Orbitz
competitors.notes: OTA later acquired by Expedia in 2015

competitors.name: TripAdvisor
competitors.notes: Reviews platform with growing booking influence

competitors.name: Hotel Direct
competitors.notes: Hotels offering best rate guarantees for direct booking
